summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 26th Avenue Northwest, from West 73rd Street to the north line of Loyal Heights Addition, Division No. 6; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 12763 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
